nodes.text: The Vibroblade Brigade was a mercenary group hired by the Corporate Alliance's Magistrate, Passel Argente, during the Clone Wars. The group was hired in order to protect corporate assets. The brigade was present in the defense of Murkhana City during the Outer Rim Sieges.

The Vibroblade Brigade was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The brigade was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader, a 2005 novel written by James Luceno and published by Del Rey, and the third and final installment of The Dark Lord Trilogy.
